attributes.action: Re-think the proposals on banning in-store cigarette displays.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Displaying tobacco products at the point of sale is essential to enable adult consumers to make an informed choice based on availability, price and brand. Shop staff security could be a serious issue if they have to bend down to go under the counter to get cigarettes, this would be an ideal opportunity for theives to steal from stores or for people to attack store workers to get takings etc.
